mapper.select: SELECT SERVER.server_id, MANAGER.manager_id, EVENT.event_id, EVENT.event_code, SERVER.ip, EVENT_MANAGER.alert_mth as ntfc_mth, MANAGER.email, MANAGER.phone_no FROM SERVER JOIN EVENT ON EVENT.server_id = SERVER.server_id JOIN EVENT_MANAGER ON EVENT_MANAGER.event_id = EVENT.event_id JOIN MANAGER ON MANAGER.manager_id = EVENT_MANAGER.manager_id WHERE EVENT.event_code = #{eventCode} AND SERVER.ip = #{ip} AND EVENT.sttus = 'ACT01'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION_TEMP (server_id, manager_id, event_id, event_code, ip, msg, ntfc_mth, manager_email, manager_cttpc, logde) VALUES ( #{serverId}, #{managerId}, #{eventId}, #{eventCode}, #{ip}, #{msg}, #{ntfcMth}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerCttpc}, #{logde} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from SERVER WHERE ip = #{ip}
mapper.insert: insert into EVENT_HISTORY (server_id, team_id, rgsde) select server_id, team_id, current_timestamp() from SERVER where ip = #{ip}
